Arrangements that will outlast everyone you love.

About Dusty

My father ran Crichton & Sons Abatement Services for thirty-two years. My brother and I were the Sons. We cleared hospitals, schools, shipyards. We wore the suits. We followed the protocols.

The thing about chrysotile asbestos is it looks like frozen hair. White, silky, impossibly fine. My father used to say it was nature's way of showing us that beauty and harm are the same thing, just at different distances.

Esmeralda says I should take this part out.

After the lawsuit settled, I had two choices: burn the remaining inventory or make something of it. Esmeralda suggested flowers. She'd worked in mortuary arrangements before the abatement business. She understood the overlap.

The arrangements are safe as long as you follow the instructions. My father followed the instructions too.

FAQ / Disclaimer

Our arrangements are considered safe when handled according to the enclosed instructions, which include: do not disturb the fibers, do not inhale near the arrangement, do not place in high-traffic areas, do not allow children or pets within six feet, do not expose to wind or vibration.

We make no claims regarding long-term safety and recommend consulting with a certified abatement professional before purchase.

We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. All returned items must be sealed in the original containment vessel and clearly labeled with hazard warnings. Returns must be processed through a licensed hazmat shipping carrier.

Refunds are issued minus a 15% restocking fee and the cost of professional re-containment. Please allow 8-12 weeks for processing, pending EPA approval.

Certain arrangements from our Chernobyl Collection may exhibit low-level luminescence due to trace contamination acquired during the sourcing process. This is cosmetic only and does not indicate increased danger beyond the standard risks.

If the glow intensifies or you experience nausea, nosebleeds, or hair loss, please contact our customer service line and evacuate the immediate area.

Federal law requires all asbestos-containing materials to be shipped in containers bearing hazard labels, EPA tracking numbers, and warning text visible from a distance of 50 feet.

We cannot remove these labels. We can, however, include a complimentary gift card that says "Thinking of you" to soften the impact.
